# Admin Assets - LLM Context

## Build Output Directory

This directory contains Vite-generated production assets.

## ⚠️ Warning

**Do NOT modify files in this directory.** They are auto-generated.

Source code: `admin-ui/src/`
Build command: `npm run admin:build`

## File Naming

Vite uses content hashing for cache busting:
- `index-[hash].js` - Main JavaScript bundle
- `index-[hash].css` - Compiled CSS
- `*.js.map` - Source maps for debugging

## Regeneration

Files are replaced on each build. The hash changes when content changes.
